category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMSetupSheetFixUnit
preference.preference_description: Specifies which unit system's setup sheet templates are used to generate setup sheets for resources. Valid values for this preference are "off", "metric", and "inch". The default value is "off". The different values lead to the following behavior: off: Based on the resource's ICO unit, the preference "MRMSetupSheetTemplatesMetric" or "MRMSetupSheetTemplatesInch" is used to determine the setup sheet template. metric: Only metric templates specified in the "MRMSetupSheetTemplatesMetric" preference are used. Inch ICO values are converted to metric when used in the setup sheet. inch: Only the inch templates specified in the "MRMSetupSheetTemplatesInch" preference are used. Metric ICO values are converted to inch when used in the setup sheet.
